settingsSpecWeights-msg: Here you can modify your priorities regarding the EUCs features. These changes will change how each EUC is scored in the comparator.
settingsSpecWeightsPresets-msg: You can choose one of the predefined settings that best suits your preferences.
settingsSpecWeightsCustom-msg: If none of the presets suit your preferences, here you can meticulously customize how each feature is scored.
